title: Gatphy Pet Food Measuring Scoop Scale, 250ml Digital Pet Food Scoop with LED Display with 4 Measuring Units Precise Dog Cat Food Measuring Scale Kitchen Food Scale for Pets Food Kitchen Baking Cooking
features: ✅【Precise & Convenient】This pet food measuring scoop is a high precision electronic measuring scale, max measuring up to 250ml /800g, clear display can accurately measure the weight of pet food and water, and can easily control the pets diet to prevent pets from eating too much and affecting health.

✅【Digital Screen Display】Digital spoon scale with LCD display, balance adjustment function ensure your precise measurement. Easy to read and use. To avoid errors, please press the power button to zero out the scale before weighing; keep the balance of the measuring spoon when weighing.
✅【4 Measurement Units】Effective measurement of g, ml, cup, ounce. Simply press the UNIT button to change the unit of measurement.
✅【Detachable】Digital pet food scoop align the metal plate of the handle with the fixed slot, easy to install and remove, washable, avoid wetting the handgrip.

✅【Wide Application】 Capable of measuring solid and liquid ingredients, like pet food, water and so on; Handy for measuring pet food (for dog, cat, bird); Even ingredients while cooking or baking, extremely meets your various needs.
description: Product Description Package List: 1x Electronic Pet Food Scoop Cup Specification: Name: Pet Food Electronic Weighing Spoon Scale Material: ABS Size: 23*9.5cm Power supply: CR2032 button battery (not included) Capacity: 800g/250ml Units: g/ml/cup/fl.oz/oz Feature: ✔ Removable Pet Food Spoon Scale, made of the spoon and handle, you can only wash the spoon. The handle is not washable. ✔ The tare button makes it a breeze to reset the display to zero, which means you can measure multiple ingredients at once. ✔ Widely usage: Pet food, baking material, coffee beans, spices, flower, liquid, etc. High Precise The maximum weight can reach 800 grams, and the error value is within 1 grams 4 Weighting Units You can choose from g/ml/cup/oz. Pressing the UNIT bottom to switchover, meet your different needs. For Solid and Liquid Products You can weigh pet food, butter, flour, spices, coffee beans, water, juice and more. Washable Spoon Removable pet food spoon scale is consist of the spoon and handle, you can only wash the spoon. The handle is not washable.

specifications_table.Product care instructions: ‎[Hand wash the spoon part, handle the electronic components with care, replace the battery when needed]
